Storage>Premium Storage

Premium Storage

Suitable for low-latency I/O intensive apps and high-throughput storage

Key Scenarios:

  • Sustain SQL Server virtual machines
  • Create enterprise level, persistent apps
  • Upgrade enterprise apps and migrate them to the cloud

Sustain SQL Server virtual machines

Azure Premium Storage is a specially designed DS Series Virtual Machine with further strengthened disk performance. You can add many more permanent disks and, for your time-critical apps, these disks can provide a maximum of 32 TB of storage and exceed 50,000 IOPS; moreover, read operations will not exceed a delay of more than 1 microsecond.

Low-Latency, high-throughput storage

Azure Premium Storage is based on new SSD storage for low latency and high-throughput. It is designed to support requirements for severe enterprise workloads on the cloud.

Durable and high-availability

Azure Premium Storage can automatically backup your data to assist in preventing unexpected hardware failures to ensure that your hardware is always available. Azure data persists in permanent storage, which is extremely important. Azure clients can depend on their data being permanent and having a high degree of fault tolerance for crucial apps. This is premium storage that saves 3 copies of data within the same region.
